segments.text: Do you have any direct flights to Toronto ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , we don't . But I think you can fly on Northwest Airlines to Berlin and then have a connecting flight on Canada Airline to Toronto . And it is the most economical flight , just 1,900 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At 8 am . By the way , it also makes a refueling stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how long do I have to stay in Berlin for the connecting flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not so long , just one hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So the time for the total journey is about ... ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me count . Ok , it works out for my schedule . Thanks a lot !
segments.speaker: S1
